file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 12-21-06-03 - COCKPIT UNDERFLOOR ACCESS HATCH - SERVICING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL COCKPIT UNDERFLOOR ACCESS HATCH - SERVICING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to lubricate the Cockpit Underfloor Access Hatch. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY COCKPIT UNDERFLOOR ACCESS ALL 12-21-06-600-801-A HATCH - LUBRICATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 12-21-06 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 12-21-06-600-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. COCKPIT UNDERFLOOR ACCESS HATCH - LUBRICATION A. General (1) This procedure helps the door internal mechanism to operate correctly and the door to move freely. This makes the opening/closing operations easier. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 123 123BL Area below cockpit floor - LH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially To lubricate the cockpit underfloor access Brush AR available hatch F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MIL-G-23827 Grease AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task On the cockpit underfloor access hatch I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove cockpit underfloor access hatch 123BL (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Lubrication (Figure 301) SUBTASK 610-002-A (1) Lubricate the latch pins. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 12-21-06 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install cockpit underfloor access hatch 123BL (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 12-21-06 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
